comment: Not at all helpful. Bad attitude and condescending in e-mails. Refused to give useful  instructions to aid in completing classwork. Would never take her again, even if it meant I had to delay graduating.

I love Dr. Guillory! She's so sweet, and she really knows her stuff. Come to class with an open mind, but be prepared to Google a lot of unfamiliar terms if you're not in sociologyGWST. Had a lot of great discussions in her class, and it was the only one that I truly looked forward to going to this past semester.

I took her over the summer so she was probably more strict than in usual semesters due to the small amount of time we had. She is nice, very clear, and I can tell she loves what she does. She wants you to realize that education is serious and life-changing. Thought-provoking class. You will need to have the textbook.

She is clear on what she wants. She is always available to help.  She is a great professor. Her classes are easy as long as you do your work. Would definitely take her again. No textbook! Just three little books you read throughout the course.
GREAT teacher! Take her if you can, she makes you think.  She encourages students and wants them to succeed. Perfect model of what a teacher should be.
Really nice
Excellent professor. Would highly recommend for anyone who wants to stretch their brain.
She has high expectations, but she is very reasonable. She works with the students and has open discussions about class materials. Great class. I learned alot.

I took Dr. Guillory over the summer and I loved her. I felt intimidated at the beginning because she set out lots of rules for her class. For example, she will deduct points if you come to class late or if you miss a class. She teaches you to be responsible and act the way college students should. Take her and I promise you wont regret it.

Very nice, helpful  and organized teacher. If you don't pass her class its because you just did not try. Attendace is mandatory. So to those of you who thinks she is a terrible proffesor you just did not try hard enough.  Dont expect everything to be easy in this life.

LOVED HER!!!! If you get the opportunity to take Dr. Guillory, take the class!!! She is awesome, very clear on expectations and will help if you ask for it. Very quick to return emails. She is a wonderful influence on prospective teachers!!!

What I appreciate the most is a teacher who is thorough and organized, Dr. Guillory is. She is fair & fun. Her tests follow the information you learn, her quizzes are based on the chapters you read. If you are simply a good student you will do great in here! Loved her. You learn a lot!
One of the coolest teachers ever! Very understanding and gives second chances.
She is an A easy teacher if you do your work, however she is very disrespectful to her students. Calling them out in front of the class or talking about other students.
Very good teacher, though there is a lot of work involved. However, she gives second chances. You have to read the text book. Overall, a challenging but enjoyable experience.

Loved this class. She is tough on you to recognize your personal biases and ways to change them but she is crystal clear and she designs her grades to prevent one bad grade from messing you up. Do the work, do well in your field experience, and read the chapters. I got bad quiz grades but As on everything else, so I got an A for the class.

Comes across kind of abrasive at time. She knows alot about the subject matter and is helpful when you ask how to apply the lesson to a real classroom. BUT- there are probably 4 projects, 7 or 8 quizzes and you have to participate in class discussion. No final exam, but by that point youve had enough projects to feel like youve taken multiple exams

Interesting time in this class. Not that she is not a good teacher, but she purposely focuses on how white people are the main problem in our schools and why there was racism. She talked about no other cultures having issues other than whites. Even said that we(the whole class)would never suffer like her and her son would if stopped by police.

Great class, great discussions. Easy A, you'll have a quiz every week, didn't study for most of them and still got an A on them. Very, very fair on grading, will give an opportunity to make up a bad assignment if needed. Do the work, and show up for class and you'll have an easy A in her class.
Dr Guillory is interesting and funny! She has a lot of experience and is very knowledgeable about subject matter.
The best teacher ever!!Take her!..u have to read and be prepared for test but its so worth it and a ksu experience.
amazing teacher with an incredible knowledge of subject matter.
Fantastic educator.  She is really excited about her subject matter.  The class discussions were the best I have witnessed.  Read the text to be ready for the quizzes.  Highly Recommend!
Professor Guilory is one of the best teachers I have had at KSU.  She has high expectations and gives plenty of opportunities for students to express their opinions.  I enjoyed her class very much!!!

AWESOME teacher!! I learned SO much from her. She grades extremely fair and be prepared to work. You have to go to class b/c she gives you points for easy in-class assignments. Read your book, do the projects, and you will make an "A". You have 3 projects to do, but they are fun. She is willing to help you anyway she can...she CARES and is fair!
She is awful. Worst teacher I ever had in my whole college career.
I love her!  She's seriously my hero. =)
She is awful.

she is wonderful. she makes thinking fun and interesting. learned so much.  no tests but daily quizzes(1 or 2 questions  easy, just read). her grading scale is suited fo rthe student and she rarely takes any points of for assignments. you will have fun. just read.
excellent teacher. really care. will give you all the time in her office (she is always there)
